Story select (order: Amy, Omochao, Eggma.Text: Which story do you wish to try?

Scene select.Text: Which scene do you want to start?
Which scene do you wanna start from?
Where do you want to start from?

Character select.Text: Who are you going to be?

Stage select.Text: Decide which stage to go to.
Is this the stage you would like to go to?
What stage are we going to play?

2P battle screen.Text: Which game would you like to play?
Better not let the dark side win!
Who are you going to be? Me?

Also 2P, I think.Text: Which game do you want to play?
Which story are you interested in?

2P group select (Dreamcast).Text: Want to be the hero? Or villain?
You better choose the dark side!
Are you a good guy or a bad guy?
So who's gonna be the hero?

2P character selected (Sonic, Shadow, Ta.Text: I will protect the Master Emerald!

Options.Text: Looks like you can change many things!
Looks like you can change things here.
Looks like you can change settings.
Looks like you can change many things.
Looks like you can change many things.
You can change things to your liking here.

Sound test.Text: You can listen to songs here.
There's no time to be listening to music!
Listen to various sounds in the game.
You can listen to songs here.
Select a song if you like.
Which music would you like to listen to?
Listen to music if you want.

Emblem results.Text:
You've gotten just about
all of the emblems, haven't you?

You can see all emblems
that you have collected.
Haven't you got all the emblems yet?
So how many emblems do you have so far?

You can see all of the emblems
that you have collected.
Why haven't you collected them all yet?

This is the result of the emblems
collected so far.
Check out how many emblems you have.
How many emblems do you have?

Kart racing.Text: This is the kart driving game!
This is a racing game, you know?
This is the kart driving game.

Theme select.Text: Select a theme for your menu screen!

You can change the theme
on your menu screen.

You can change various items
on your menu screen.
You can change the menu screen.
What? I'm not good enough for you?

Would you like to customize
the main menu?

Omochao tutorial (accessible with Menu O.Text:
Hi! I'm Omochao! Let me be your guide!
Select a category that
you would like to explore!
Press A button to confirm your selection.

Press B button to go back
to the previous screen.

Let me tell you about
Sonic and Shadow's game!

Let me tell you about
Eggman and Tails' game!

Let me tell you about
Knuckles and Rouge's game!
Let me tell you about Chao!

Let me tell you about the basic controls
used for all characters!

Tails (common).Text: Hmm, which way should I go?

Knuckles (common).Text: All right, let's find the next Emerald.

Shadow (common).Text: I feel danger all around me.

Eggman (common).Text:
Ugh... I'm really getting tired
of operating this machine.

City Escape.Text: This city sure has some steep hills.

Wild Canyon.Text:
If I don't hurry it up,
that bat girl will find it first.

Prison Lane.Text:
I've got to find Sonic.
He's in jail!

Green Forest.Text:
There's not much time left.
This island is about to explode!
There are even military robots here too!

Pumpkin Hill.Text:
I can sense a piece
of the Emerald is nearby.

Mission Street.Text:
I've got to lose them.
There must be a place to hide!

Aquatic Mine.Text:
What is a piece of the Master Emerald
doing here?

I'll use the water level
to my advantage.

Hidden Base.Text: There must be a way to get in there.

Pyramid Cave.Text:
There's gotta be a way
I can get outta this place.

So this is what the inside
of the pyramid looks like.

Death Chamber.Text:
Where is the key hidden?..
Think!

Eternal Engine.Text:
I've got to find the power supply
and destroy it!
It's getting hard to breathe in here.

Meteor Herd.Text:
This just doesn't make any sense.
What are the Emeralds doing in space?

Crazy Gadget.Text: Amy, Tails, I'm on my way!
This place is a real pain in the butt!

Final Rush.Text:
There's no time to waste.
It's about to fire!

There's nothing that can stop me.
Even when I'm in outer space.

Iron Gate.Text: No matter what you do, it's mine!

Do you think that pile of junk
is going to stop me?

Dry Lagoon.Text:
Even if I collect all the pieces,
can he really put it back together?

Sand Ocean.Text:
Now I've got to start over
from the base.

My machines hate the sand,
I've got to get out of here.

Radical Highway.Text:
Let's ditch these guys
and blow the city.

Egg Quarters.Text:
The key is got to be
somewhere around here.

There sure are a lot of
weird robots around here.

Lost Colony.Text:
I thought the central
control room is this way.

Could this be the place
my grandfather wrote of?

Weapons Bed.Text: Let's see if I can have some fun now!
Those fools are no match for me!

Security Hall.Text: I'll check on that data on Shadow later.

You must be kidding!
The security here is a joke!

White Jungle.Text:
There's no time to waste.
It's about to explode.

Sky Rail.Text:
The last Chaos Emerald
will be within my reach soon.
That rail sure came in handy.

Mad Space.Text:
Looks like we'll have
all the pieces very shortly.
Hmm... These hints make no sense!

Cosmic Wall.Text: Sonic! This time I can't lose!

Boy, this walker design
is perfectly suited for space!

Final Chase.Text:
I don't know who you are
but I will destroy you!
This place hasn't changed a bit.

Cannon's Core.Text: I'll give it my best shot!
I should get over there. Now!

Once you get out of here,
it will be up to them.
The central dome must be over there.

Are we cutting it kinda close?
No time!

There's no way I can leave
without that Emerald over there.

Where is that switch
Eggman was talking about?
The cannon's core is over there.

City Escape.Text:
Attention all units! Suspect seen
heading south! Block all major roads
and capture the suspect!

Route 101.Text:
The President must be over there.
Let's go!
Tails, did you find the President?

Almost, Sonic!
Just a few more minutes!

Eternal Engine (story mode).Text: Tails, I've found the control room!
Got it! I'll destroy the power supply!

Crazy Gadget (story mode).Text:
Hahahaha! Sonic!
Come here if you want to save her life!

What are you doing, Sonic?
There's no time for games!

You're too slow! Sonic!
If you don't come here she will die!

Well done, Sonic! But you'll never
leave this room alive, haha!

Iron Gate alerts.Text:
Intruder alert!
Assume level 1 defense formation!

Level 1 security door breach!
Emergency formation!
Intercept intruder!

Level 2 security door breach!
Level 2 security door breach!

Level 3 security door breach!
Intruder has breached sections 3-8!
Get him!

Level 5 security door breach!
Switch to emergency defense mode!
Lock down final security door!

Security Hall.Text:
Rouge! Get the Chaos Emeralds
before the military finds you!

Hurry up, Rouge!
The island is set to blow up!

What are you doing? Get going!
Bring me the Chaos Emeralds now!

What in the world are you doing?
You took longer than you were supposed to!

Rouge! It's going to explode!
Hurry up! Get going!

No! That's no good!
You've spoiled my plans!

Route 280.Text:
I'm picking up a signal from the Emerald.
Fox boy, wait for me!

Wait a minute! Be quiet!
Just leave it to me!
What a time to run out of gas...

Cannon's Core alerts.Text:
System alert! System alert!
The intruder has breached the system area!
Initiate debug program!

System alert! System alert!
Energy core safe program terminated!
Self-repair program initializing!

System alert! System alert!
Primary security lock system terminated!
Initiate final defense systems!

Tails.Text: I got to do better next time.

Shadow.Text: Maybe I didn't try hard enough.
I guess I'm not at full power here.

Eggman.Text: Now you know why I am the best!
I should've tried a little harder.

Rouge.Text: How was that? Perfect? Like me?!
It's all too easy for me!
I guess I took a little too much time.
I'm ashamed to call myself a hunter.

Sonic.Text: Do you know who I am?
Did you really think you had a chance?

Shadow.Text:
No time to hang out
with the likes of you.
I told you, I'm the ultimate.

I must destroy all the evil
the Professor has created!

Eggman.Text: Better luck next time, fox boy!

Rouge.Text:
Not bad, huh?
I'm pretty strong, all right!
Now give me back those jewels!

Captured/stunned.Text: You think you can hold me?

Tech points (Sonic's trick ramps and com.Text: Now you know my real power!

Mechs taking damage.Text: My machine has reached its limit!
You! I'll make you pay for this!
Oh no! My power is going down!

Characters dying from taking damage.Text: I thought I could do it...

Omochao bullying.Text:
Ouch! Why are you being such a bully?
I didn't do anything wrong!
I'm leaving!

Ow! That hurts! I'm mad at you!
I'm not going to help you anymore!
Hm!

Owie! I can't believe you do that to me!
Why would you do something like that?

W-what? What happened?
Who am I? Where am I?
Agh! Stop it! Let me go!
Hey! Stop it!
Please! Let go of me!

What are you doing?
Why don't you get yourself
a teddy bear?
Ah! Aaah! Help me!

Hey, I'm on your side, you know!
I can give you hints to help you!

I'm sorry. I understand.
I will eat all my carrots.

I'm not a weapon to throw
at enemies, you know!

Somebody help me!
It's getting worse!

If you don't stop it, I'll get mad!
I'm gonna tell my mom on you!

Thanks for saving me!
I was scared!

Stop it! What are you doing?
You're making me mad!

Aaah, I was so scared...
What hint?

Thank you for holding me.
But you were kind of rough.
Stop it!
Help me!
Bye-bye!
Hey there! What are you doing?

I'm not bad!
You've got the wrong idea!

It's too high here!
I'm scared of heights!
Woooh... I was a little scared!
Wooow! I'm flying!
Woohoo! It's like a trampoline!
Hey you! Where are you taking me?
Shoot... Where am I...?
I wanna go home...

I can't believe you cleared
the stage holding me?
Ow! Hey, that hurts!
Owie! Why do I have to go through this?

They're not after me, are they?
You're terrible!
Ouch! Chao Doctor, help me!
Phew! That big truck scared me!

What are you thinking,
trying to finish this stage with me?

All I can see is water.
Where is my home?

I got to get out of here,
before the island blows up!
A pumpkin ghost? I'm afraid!
Maybe it rusted because of the water.

Wow, that was scary!
I'm going home to watch TV.
Where am I? Somebody help me!

How'd I get into outer space?
Oh well...

Hmm, this looks like
a game I've seen before.

I'll find my own way home.
Bye-bye!

I'm going to play
with the turtle now.
I feel dizzy.

I'm outta here,
before the robot gets me!
Let me out of this safe!
This fog reminds me of San Francisco.

Wow, it's getting late.
I got to go to kindergarten.
You should always tell the truth!

I'll use my propeller
to fly in space. Why is that?

I've never been here before.
I'm going sightseeing!

I'm almost out of energy.
I need to be wound back up.
All right. Whatever!

If you don't stop that,
I will tell the Principle on you!

If you let me go, I'll tell you
how many Omochao there are!

Big Foot.Text:
Spider troop Big Foot
reporting to headquarters.
Intruder has been located.

This is Spider troop Big Foot. Big Foot
to headquarters, over! We've engaged
the enemy and request backup!

Hot Shot.Text:
This is Scorpion troop's Hot Shot.
Enemy movement has been detected.
En route to intercept and destroy.

This is Scorpion troop's Hot Shot.
The enemy is stronger than expected.
Request additional support!

Flying Dog.Text:
This is Flying Dog to headquarters.
Intruder found entering Security Hall.
Preparing to attack.

This is Flying Dog to headquarters.
We're taking heavy damage.
Close the Security Hall!

It's just not possible...
This Flying Dog can't be destroyed...

Eggman 1.Text:
Mwahahaha! You're just a kid!
You couldn't beat me in a hundred years!
Stupid little fox!
Ouch! That's it! I'm gonna destroy you!
You won't escape me this time!
Whoa! Now you've made me mad!
Darn... I let my guard down...

Eggman 2.Text:
You're no match for me,
you weak little fox!
Aaah! Don't think you've won yet!
Whoa! Now you've done it, Tails!
No... I can't lose to Tails...
All right. No more games, Tails!

Knuckles.Text:
Hand over those Master Emeralds.
Give them to me!
Ugh... I have no choice but to fight now!

I must... protect...
the Master Emerald...

Rouge.Text:
Very well. If that's how you wanna play,
I will take it from you!
Aah! Now you've made me mad!

This can't be true...
I never lose...
Here I come! Just watch me!

Shadow 1.Text:
There's no time to play games.
You won't even get the chance.

Oh, I see.
So you're not just a hedgehog.
Time to put this to rest!
Darn... Not bad for an imposter...

Shadow 2.Text:
Before this is over, I'll show you
the true power of Chaos Control!
Oh... You're better than I thought...

Impossible...
I am the ultimate life...

Sonic 1.Text:
You can't get away this time!
There's only one real Sonic!

Sonic 2.Text:
All right, Shadow!
Time for me to finish this!

Ugh... No time to waste...
Take this!
I'm not done with you yet!

Tails 1.Text:
Eggman!
You won't get away with this!

Tails 2.Text:
What have you done to Sonic?
I'll never forgive you for this!
Uh... There's no way I'm gonna lose!

I'll show you how powerful
my Cyclone is!

Finalhazard.Text:
Shadow, switch places with me!
You're out of rings!

Shadow, you're almost out of rings!
You'll lose your super form!

Sonic, what are you doing?
You're almost out of rings.
Switch places with me!

Sonic, you're out of rings!
You will lose your super form!

Shadow, let me collect rings!
Keep him busy for a while!

Yeah! Take that, you creep!
Shadow, are you OK?

I'll collect the rings.
Now it's up to you, Sonic!

All right, this is working!
Sonic, how are you doing?

Shadow, you need rest.
Let me give it a try!

Sonic, leave it to me!
I'll destroy him!

Knuckles and Rouge.Text: I am one with the Master Emerald!
I won't lose to the likes of you!

Hm, not as strong
as you thought you were.
All the world's jewels will be mine!
Haha, I'm better than you are!
You have no chance against me!
I won't give you a chance!
You won't be so lucky this time!
Looks like I'm winning. As usual.
I'll get the last piece too!

Sonic and Shadow.Text: Let me show you my real power.

Hm, faker.
No chance to win against me!
No matter what, you'll still lose!

Soon enough...
I'll show you my true power.
You're not as strong as I thought.

Tails and Eggman.Text: Do you think you can beat me?
Let's do it one more time!
This time I will show you my power!

Amy.Text: You're not Sonic! Who are you?

Ooooh, I hate it when
they leave me behind!

You've gotten just about
all of the emblems, haven't you?
I'm going to do my best, Sonic!

Tikal.Text: How can I make you understand?

Light attack.Text: There's no time to play games.
